hero.title: Your Business Deserves
hero.subtitle: a Solid Foundation
hero.description: We don't build websites. We engineer digital ecosystems that become the backbone of your business — secure, automated, and built to outlast your competition.

usp.title: Why Premium Clients Choose Us
usp.subtitle: We're not the cheapest. We're the ones you call when failure isn't an option.

quality.title: ISO & OWASP Standards
quality.description: We build information security processes with ISO 27001 and OWASP Top 10 requirements in mind. When needed, we engage certified partners for independent PenTesting and security audits.

security.title: Zero Vendor Lock-in
security.description: We don't tie you to any contractor, platform, or technology. The code is yours. Documentation is yours. Any other team can maintain and develop the system without our involvement.

support.title: Lifetime Support
support.description: We don't disappear after launch. For each project, we offer flexible long-term support options — from one-time consultations to full SLA. Terms are discussed individually.

ecosystem.title: Microservices Architecture
ecosystem.description: Modular architecture with independent services allows you to scale individual components, update the system incrementally, and minimize risks during changes.

guarantee.title: No Hidden Fees. No Monthly Subscriptions.
guarantee.description: Pay for results, not promises. Support terms are discussed individually for each project.

metrics.title: Results We Aim For
metrics.subtitle: Every project is unique. Specific metrics are defined in individual SLA agreements.
metrics.disclaimer: Results vary by project. Guarantees are discussed individually and specified in contracts.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive IT solutions tailored to your needs. From concept to deployment, we strive for impeccable results.

cloud.title: Cloud Migration
cloud.description: We help migrate infrastructure to the cloud with minimal downtime risk. AWS, Azure, GCP — we select the platform based on your needs and budget. Goal: cost optimization and flexible scaling.

modernization.title: System Modernization
modernization.description: We update legacy systems while preserving core functionality. Code refactoring, architecture improvements, UX optimization. Results depend on the initial project state.

digital_reboot.title: Digital Reboot
digital_reboot.description: Comprehensive digital presence update: redesign, automation, CRM and analytics integration. We create a connected ecosystem instead of disconnected tools.

turnkey.title: Turnkey IT Partner
turnkey.description: We work as your external IT department. Development, support, consulting — without the need to hire staff. Flexible cooperation terms for specific projects.

research.title: Analytics & Strategy
research.description: We research the market, analyze competitors, and form development strategy. You receive a structured plan with recommendations and priorities.

telegram_bots.title: Telegram Bots
telegram_bots.description: We develop bots for communication and business process automation. From notifications to complex scenarios with payment and CRM integration.

telegram_apps.title: Telegram Mini Apps
telegram_apps.description: We create apps inside Telegram — no App Store installation needed. Stores, booking services, personal accounts. Access to the messenger's audience without barriers.

websites.title: Web Development
websites.description: We develop websites focused on performance and conversion. Modern stack, SEO optimization, responsive design. From landing pages to complex web platforms.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: We create iOS and Android apps with native performance. UX design, development, and store publishing assistance.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: We automate routine operations: reports, data synchronization, notifications. Goal — reduce manual work and minimize errors.

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: We implement AI-based solutions: chatbots, data analysis, personalization. We use OpenAI, Claude and other platforms — selecting based on specific tasks.

security.title: Cybersecurity
security.description: We conduct security audits and implement protective measures: encryption, 2FA, monitoring. We help comply with GDPR and Swiss DPA requirements.

documentation.title: Technical Documentation
documentation.description: We prepare complete documentation for each project: technical specifications, user guides, deployment instructions.

accessibility.title: Accessibility (a11y)
accessibility.description: We adapt products for users with disabilities. WCAG compliance, screen reader support, high contrast modes.

devops.title: DevOps & SRE
devops.description: We set up CI/CD pipelines, containerization, monitoring and alerting. We help build reliable delivery and operations processes.

integration.title: Integrations & API
integration.description: We connect your systems with each other and external services. We develop and document APIs. Integration with CRM, ERP, payment systems.

discovery.title: Product Discovery
discovery.description: We help formulate and validate ideas before development begins. User research, prototyping, hypothesis validation.

training.title: Team Training
training.description: We conduct workshops and training for your employees. Modern technologies, development methodologies, tool proficiency.

maintenance.title: Technical Support
maintenance.description: We ensure stable operation of your systems. Monitoring, updates, bug fixes. Flexible SLA terms tailored to your needs.

tech.title: Technologies We Master

planning.title: Planning

development.title: Development
development.description: Agile development with regular updates, code reviews, and quality assurance at every step.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Thorough testing, deployment, and optimization to ensure a smooth and successful launch.

support.title: Support
support.description: Ongoing maintenance, updates, and 24/7 support to keep your solution running perfectly.
